summary: The contact owns a 2018 Tiffin Allegro Bus. The contact stated that while driving at various speeds, the vehicle would independently downshift as the Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) warning light would illuminate. The manufacturer was notified of the failure and the contact was informed that they were aware of the failure; however, parts for the repair was unavailable. The vehicle had yet to be repaired. The failure mileage was approximately 8,000.
